00030 /**
00031  * Abstract class for the plugin wizard icon classes
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 abstract class tx_oop_Plugin_Wizard_Icon
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The extension key
00042      */
00043     private $_extKey     = '';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * The plugin name
00047      */private  $_piName = '';
00048     
00049     /**
00050      * The plugin number
00051      */
00052     private $_piNum      = '';
00053     
00054     /**
00055      * The language object
00056      */
00057     private $_lang       = NULL;
00058     
00059     /**
00060      * The language object
00061      */
00062     private $_reflection = NULL;
00063     
00064     /**
00065      * Class constructor
00066      * 
00067      * @return  NULL
00068      * @see     _setStaticVars
00069      */
00070     public function __construct()
00071     {
00072         // Creates a relfection object for the current instance
00073         $this->_reflection = new ReflectionObject( $this );
00074         
00075         // Gets the current path
00076         $extPathInfo = explode( DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $this->_reflection->getFileName() );
00077         
00078         // Removes the file name and the 'classes' directory
00079         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00080         array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00081         
00082         // Sets the extension key
00083         $this->_extKey = array_pop( $extPathInfo );
00084         
00085         // Sets the plugin name
00086         $this->_piName = str_replace( '_', '', $this->_extKey );
00087         
00088         // Sets the plugin number
00089         $this->_piNum  = substr( str_replace( 'tx_' . $this->_piName . '_', '', get_class( $this ) ), 0, -8 );
00090         
00091         // Creates the language object
00092         $this->_lang = tx_oop_Lang_Getter::getInstance( 'EXT:' . $this->_extKey . '/lang/wiz-' . $this->_piNum . '.xml' );
00093     }
00094     
00095     /**
00096      * Adds the plugin wizard icon to the wizard items array
00097      *
00098      * @param   array   The wizard items
00099      * @return  array   The modified array with the wizard items
00100      */
00101     public function proc( array $wizardItems )
00102     {
00103         // Wizard item
00104         $wizardItems[ 'plugins_tx_' . $this->_piName . '_' . $this->_piNum ] = array(
00105             
00106             // Icon
00107             'icon'        => t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath( $this->_extKey ) . 'res/img/wiz-' . $this->_piNum . '.gif',
00108             
00109             // Title
00110             'title'       => $this->_lang->title,
00111             
00112             // Description
00113             'description' => $this->_lang->description,
00114             
00115             // Parameters
00116             'params'      => '&defVals[tt_content][CType]=list&defVals[tt_content][list_type]=' . $this->_extKey . '_' . $this->_piNum
00117         );
00118         
00119         // Returns the wizard items
00120         return $wizardItems;
00121     }
00122 }
